01 - I Hate To Think ----- Tom Marolda
02 - Too Blonde To See ----- Tom Marolda
03 - Just Another Doris Day ----- Tom Marolda
04 - Odd Equilibrium ----- Tom Marolda
05 - God Is A Girl ----- Richie Sambora/Tom Marolda
06 - Angel Baby ----- Tom Marolda
07 - Paleface ----- Tom Marolda
08 - Be Careful What U Wish 4 ----- Tom Marolda

-One of my fave albums this,sure there are poppy(ish) overtones but the album is well "off the wall". The standout track for me is probably "God is a Girl" which some may have heard on an old Frontiers magazine sampler. But there&#039;s some great songs,it almost has the feel of Jellyfish in places.If you like your music straight ahead with no twists then stay clear of this,but if you like a few surprises and like stuff a little "different" then check it out. ~ review from Heavy Harmonies

Described as John Lennon fronting Jellyfish, there&#039;s a definite Beatles influence, but this album ain&#039;t for everyone! Try it though, you might like it ;)
